refnamediv.refpurpose: Test whether the system is running the systemd init system

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: sd_booted() checks whether the system was booted up using the systemd init system.

refsect1.title: Return Value
refsect1.para: On failure, this call returns a negative errno-style error code. If the system was booted up with systemd as init system, this call returns a positive return value, zero otherwise.

refsect1.title: Notes
refsect1.para: Internally, this function checks whether the directory /run/systemd/system/ exists. A simple check like this can also be implemented trivially in shell or any other language.
